function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Collection of sensitive user information such as age, profession, medical history, and travel history for risk assessment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Storage of user location and bluetooth data on a centralized server.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sensitive user information between mobile devices during close contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of bluetooth and gps location data for contact tracing and monitoring may raise privacy concerns.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation and false self-diagnosis through the app.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on the accuracy of user-provided information for contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrequired self-isolation due to self-positives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of spreading virus by visiting hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contact tracing apps for monitoring covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of medical care apps may lead to misdiagnosis or incorrect treatment due to lack of physical examination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of disease spread through mobile apps leading to false positives and unnecessary self-isolation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on educational apps for e-learning may result in decreased interaction and engagement, leading to reduced learning outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for contact tracing and exposure monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid increase in use of grocery apps and delivery services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on wi-fi, bluetooth, and gps for contact identification","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on minimum number of satellites for accurate position determination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on aging satellites with limited lifespan","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Requirement for clear visibility of four satellites for accurate point calculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gps technology to monitor and record interaction frequency between infected and non-infected persons.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring user movements and alerting them based on zonal presence green zone or red zone .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interference from devices using 2.4 ghz radio frequencies can reduce wi-fi speed or cause loss of internet connection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wi-fi networks can be used for location tracing during the ongoing pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of data over radio waves","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through proximity detection using bluetooth le for contact tracing.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns in mhealth sensing applications due to data collection via bluetooth technology.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of unauthorized data disclosure in discoverable mode of bluetooth devices.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Historical development of wi-fi technology leading to current widespread adoption and usage.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bluetooth technology operates at 2.4 ghz frequency, making it more prone to hackers and privacy interference.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for contact tracing may raise privacy concerns and risks related to the misuse of personal data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective monitoring of infectious diseases in the population.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of network connectivity leading to inability to access medical data and instructions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient dissemination of quality research leading to challenges for medical staff","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risk of covid-19 through mobile applications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through video conferencing and mhealth apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks with storing patient information in a government database","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mhealth for self-monitoring without professional medical guidance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor road infrastructure and bad weather conditions impacting access to hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ambulance services in remote areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Communal spread of viral attacks leading to emergencies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased cases leading to more innovation in technological solutions for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Great communication between the public and government for disease prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Advancements in mobile technology for precise positioning of hotspots and relief approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of accurate individual health monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective tracking of geographical spread of the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data security of health information","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to natural conditions in city living","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of human-centric design in architecture","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Artificial environmental conditions associated with chronic diseases, allergies, and syndromes such as sick building syndrome","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to indoor sedentary lifestyles","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on artificial systems for lighting and ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
